objectives.skill: practise using the past simple to talk about completed actions in the past
practise using the present simple to talk about routines, habits and facts
practise using irregular verbs in the past simple
practise using s form of verbs in the present simple
practise using the verb to be in the present and past simple
practise using yes/no and open questions in the present simple and past simple
use the present and past simple with time clauses
use the past simple to talk about successive past actions and repeated actions in the past

exclusions.item: passive form of the Past and Present tense
am used to and used to
